description: Update a job production plan safety risk
permissions: User must be authorized to update records for the related job production plan (JobProductionPlanSafetyRiskPolicy delegates to job production plan access).
side_effects: Updates a job production plan safety risk record.
validation_notes: At least one updatable attribute must be provided (currently --description). If provided, --description must be non-empty. The job production plan relationship cannot be changed after creation.
